name: Plugged N Shaded
description:
Headphones and gamepad required, blind fold optional

Two characters, Jim and Bernie, have been caved into a dastardly maze. They both must find their way out. Unfortunately, Bernie can't hear, and Jim can't see. Both players must help each other out in order to get through the maze alive.

One player will be using the gamepad. They will need to play from behind the computer with headphones in. This player will be role playing as Jim, the character who can hear but cannot see. The second player, who will be role playing as Bernie, will be playing from behind the keyboard, as usual.

Use mouse to navigate the menu.
